document.full_text: a one-time aide to former illinois governor rod blagojevich testified on thursday he agreed to cooperate with a public corruption probe because he was concerned blagojevich was trying to swap official actions for campaign cash.
document.title: blagojevich aide details fund-raising concerns for jury
lines_and_colors: a one-time aide to former illinois governor rod blagojevich testified on thursday he agreed to cooperate with a public corruption probe because he was concerned blagojevich was trying to swap official actions for campaign cash.
